name: Qunit Javascript Unit Testing Framework
tagline: Qunit and Blanket Frameworks for Javascript Unit Testing and Code Coverage
body:
# Qunit Unit Testing Framework

Qunit and Blanket.js Frameworks for Javascript Unit Testing & Code Coverage

## Overview

Intent here to showcase the 

1. Qunit Jquery Framework 
2. Blanket.js for Code Coverage.

Qunit helps in Unit Testing the Javascript Methods. 

Mock the services before you commit the code.

Automate the Javascript Tests.

Blanket.js will show the Code Coverage for the code which you write.


![Qunit Sample](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-VJnkdZ6qsRM/Ux39hlrZWWI/AAAAAAAAADc/Ed9Pn46XUFU/w775-h369-no/Screen+Shot+2014-03-10+at+1.53.34+PM.png)

Developer:
Dhanu Gupta [http://dhanugupta.com]
